metadata.title: CVE-2024-42260 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/v3d: Validate passed in drm syncobj handles in the performanceextensionIf userspace provides an unknown or invalid handle anywhere in the handlearray the rest of the driver will not handle that well.Fix it by checking handle was looked up successfully or otherwise fail theextension by jumping into the existing unwind.(cherry picked from commit a546b7e4d73c23838d7e4d2c92882b3ca902d213)
